title: Kajabi + Tech Virtual Assistant – Funnels, Emails & Delivery
job_overview:
Kajabi + Tech VA Wanted – Long-Term Role with Growth Potential!

Hello and welcome 

If you love organizing systems, building automations, and keeping digital things running behind the scenes—this role is for you.
I’m looking for a technically savvy and detail-obsessed Virtual Assistant to help manage the backend of my digital product and coaching business. This is a long-term opportunity with lots of variety, growth, and respect built in.
We work fast, hold high standards, and value people who take ownership. If you’re looking for a place where you can build systems, not just fix problems, read on.

Outcome:
Make sure all our Kajabi products, pipelines, automations, and email systems are built, tested, and running perfectly—so customers and clients receive a seamless experience, and the business grows without daily founder intervention.

Responsibilities:
• Set up Kajabi courses, landing pages, pipelines, and email sequences
• Format digital products (videos, PDFs, downloads) for delivery
• Build opt-in and sales pages using branded templates
• Manage tagging, segmentation, and automations
• Connect Kajabi to other tools (e.g., Calendly, Stripe, Meta Ads, Zapier, etc.)
• Test everything—ensure all links, flows, and purchases work flawlessly
• Troubleshoot bugs and make system improvements proactively

You’ll Be a Great Fit If:
• You have 1–2+ years of experience in Kajabi, ConvertKit, or similar platforms
• You love working behind the scenes to make everything run like clockwork
• You’re a natural at documentation, checklists, and version control
• You’re confident with light tech troubleshooting and integrations
• You take initiative and solve problems
• You want to grow with a modern digital business and be trusted with key systems
• You’re comfortable using AI tools like ChatGPT or Zapier AI to streamline workflows

What’s In It for You:
• Competitive pay 
• Room to grow into a systems manager or tech lead
• Autonomy: no micromanaging, just results + respect
• A fun, fast-paced culture where your work truly matters
• Opportunities for skill-building

How to Apply:
Apply here by filling out this form: Upgrade to see actual info 
You’ll be asked to upload:
• A quick 2–3 minute Loom/video introduction
• A few links or screenshots of Kajabi or tech systems you’ve built
• Your Facebook Messenger User ID
• An inspirational quote that keeps you going
• When asked for “Your favorite software tool,” reply with: apples

Let’s build a business that works because of you—not around you.
— Aaron
